name: Slack
description: Integrate with Slack workspaces to send messages, manage channels, read conversation history, and interact with users. Enables AI-powered Slack workflows and channel management.

inputs.label: Slack Bot Token
inputs.description: Slack Bot User OAuth Token starting with xoxb-. Requires channels:history, channels:read, chat:write, users:read, and reactions:write scopes.

obtain.instructions: Create a new Slack app at api.slack.com/apps, add the required Bot Token scopes (channels:history, channels:read, chat:write, users:read, reactions:write), install to your workspace, and copy the Bot User OAuth Token.

inputs.label: Slack Team ID
inputs.description: Your Slack workspace Team ID. Found in workspace settings or by visiting your Slack workspace URL.

obtain.instructions: Open Slack, click your workspace name in the top left, select 'Settings & administration' > 'Workspace settings'. Your Team ID is displayed on this page.

auth.instructions: Requires a Slack Bot Token (xoxb-) and Team ID. Create a Slack app at https://api.slack.com/apps with the necessary scopes.
